description.value:
You find opportunities to perform stylish feats in the moments between others' heartbeats and eye blinks. You are permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Quickened]{Quickened}.

You can use the extra action only to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Tumble Through]{Tumble Through} or perform the skill action listed in your swashbuckler's style as one that allows you to gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Panache]{Panache}, or other actions that would allow you to gain panache at the GM's discretion.
